name: Bugatti - Belstaff Bond - Toro
additionalNotes: The Bugatti brand expertly crafts premium cigars designed to appeal to the aficionado looking for a refined and sophisticated smoking experience. The Ambassador, the Signature, and the Monte Carlo are part of the Bugatti lineup. The cigars are handmade in the Dominican Republic.Â Bugatti - the name stirs up thoughts of superior performance automobiles, and has for many decades. Now, Bugatti means much more for the cigar enthusiast. They have a broad range of super-premium cigars with at least one for every palate.
